title: Old diaries, 1881-1901 /
author: Gower, Ronald Sutherland
snippet: Charles Coventryamused us by telling about the Holland House ghosts. Hedeclared that the reason why Lady Holland hardly -everstirs out of the house is that she fears to meet with her" wraith," as the daughter of Rich, the first Lord Holland,is said to have done in Charles I.'s time, in the Green Lane.
